main.content-title: Do you know about the #IamNotAVirus campaign?
main.content1: As the Korona19 spread all over the world, many people are afraid.Some people are treating all Asians as carriers and discriminating against them.These phenomena are racist behavior.
main.content2: Do not use Corona19 as an element of racism.
main.content3: Please recognize Corona 19 correctly and stop discrimination.

card1.content1: Among the corona viuses, it is a coronal virus that causes infection in humans.
card1.content2: The disease is a respiratory infection that has spread around the world since its first outbreak in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.
card1.content3: It has similar characteristics to SARS, which was popular in 2003.
card1.content4: Symptoms include fever, respiratory symptoms (coughing, difficulty breathing), and severe pneumonia.
card1.content5: At the beginning of the outbreak, it was called the Wuhan Corona and the New Coronavirus.
card1.content6: Currently, the official name 'Coronavirus infection-19' is named.

sub1.title: Corona-19 can spread into the air?
sub1.content1: It cannot be transmitted in the air.
sub1.content2: It is contagious when the saliva of an infected person penetrates into the mucous membrane of the respiratory system, eyes, nose and mouth.
sub1.content3: When an infected person coughs and sneezes, small droplets of saliva and bacteria are mixed with the virus and bacteria.
sub1.content4: In the case of eyes, patients' saliva, etc., can get into the eyes directly or rub their eyes with hands contaminated with the virus, which can be transmitted through the eyes.

sub2.title: Are all Asians the carriers of the coronavirus?
sub2.content1: No, it is wrong to see all Asians as virus carriers.
sub2.content2: Not all Asians were born in China and East Asia. It is narrow-minded in itself to think this way.
sub2.content3: Many Asians are born and raised in the United States, Europe, and other various countries.
sub2.content4: People of Asian descent born and raised outside of Asia are discriminated against without visiting China and East Asia.
sub2.content5: Asians are also afraid of viruses. Immigrants are refraining from visiting their countries, and many Asians are refraining from traveling.
sub2.content6: The misconception that Asians are the medium of the virus is causing pain and fear for Asians.

sub3.title: Why do Asians wear masks because of virus carriers?
sub3.content1: No, it is to prevent infectious diseases and to protect etiquette in crowded places.
sub3.content2: If you have a bad cold as well as a coronal virus, you can wear a mask to avoid causing trouble to others.
sub3.content3: The coronavirus is currently spreading worldwide, not limited to Asia, so it can be worn for the purpose of preventing coronavirus.
sub3.content4: Wearing masks in places where people come into contact with many people, such as public transportation or public facilities,
sub3.content5: is the best way to prevent viruses. If you are afraid of your health, it is right to protect yourself by wearing a mask.

prevention.title: Coronavirus infection-19 Preventive Rules
prevention.sub-title: Compliance with preventive measures can be sufficient to reduce the probability of coronal infection.
